## Installation

```{r}
if(!"d3RZoomableTreemap" %in% installed.packages()[,"Package"])
  devtools::install_git("https://gitlab.com/lajh87/d3RZoomableTreemap")
```

## Usage

```{r}
library(d3RZoomableTreemap)

json <- jsonlite::fromJSON("data-raw/flare.json",
                           flatten = F,simplifyVector = F,
                           simplifyDataFrame = F,simplifyMatrix = F)


tree <- data.tree::FromListExplicit(json)
print(tree, "value")

zoomableTreemap(json)

```
